title: Establishes certain persons engaged in the sale of alcoholic beverages for off premise consumption may not advertise the sale of such beverages
summary: Establishes persons not licensed pursuant to the alcoholic beverage control law who are otherwise authorized to engage in the sale of alcoholic beverages for off premise consumption may not advertise the sale of such beverages or it shall be a misdemeanor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing certain persons engaged in the sale of alcoholic beverages for off premise consumption may not advertise the sale of such beverages
